alert.note: Alert for Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 8:49AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN... NORTHWESTERN BURLINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY...SOUTH CENTRAL BUCKS AND PHILADELPHIA COUNTIES... At 848 AM EST, a snow shower was located over Philadelphia, moving east at 25 mph. Light snow may accumulate on bridges and overpasses and other elevated surfaces, creating slippery conditions. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Camden, Gloucester City, Cherry Hill, Bensalem, Evesham, Mount Laurel, Willingboro, Voorhees, Lindenwold, Lumberton, Florence, Bellmawr, Burlington, Bristol, Mount Holly, Riverside, Berlin, Palmyra, and Hatboro. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 3 and 6A. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 340 and 359. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 18 and 40. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 336 and 348, and between mile markers 350 and 351. Interstate 76 in New Jersey between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 28 and 54. Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 4. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
